bluntmoderate: the bone equivalent of a faded bruise
a series of tiny chip marks
bluntsevere: a series of faded hairline cracks
bluntcritical: a fractal of reformed stress marks
slashcritical: has a deeply sliced crack, exposing marrow
burnsevere: has cracked and became brittle from heat
burncritical: has been cremated and turned into charcoal
has a deep black color, cracked and ruined
has flakes of burnt bone shedding off
piercecritical: has a deep pierce, exposing marrow
